group_1.narration: I looked at all of the people and@events in Iroha's vicinity,@but I couldn't find any sign.
I'll start looking from around here...

group_1.textLeft: So... This area of Chuo Ward is a business@district.

group_1.textRight: Yes.
Kamihama's commercial district is home@to many different kinds of businesses.
There are banks, brokerage firms, trading@companies, newspapers, and TV stations.
They're the heart of Kamihama's commerce.

group_1.textLeft: W-wow, you know a lot, Nemu...

group_1.textRight: We did some research yesterday.
And, this area also has...
*Giggle*
Huh? I didn't know you'd be here, Iroha!

group_1.textLeft: You seem like you're in a good mood...@Did something happen?

group_1.textRight: [chara:100702:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes! Something really wonderful happened!
My dear Papa said I can use the radio@telescope!
Oh, you don't know what it is?
A radio telescope gathers radio waves to@observe celestial bodies!
It can see stars that don't even register on@optical telescopes!
You've heard of the Arecibo Observatory,@haven't you, Iroha?
There, they sent the Arecibo message to@M13...
Don't interrupt me! I'm talking to Iroha.

group_1.textLeft: Can you even go to that observatory?

group_1.textRight: Of course not. My doctor won't even give me@permission to go out...
But I can control it online, and observe the@the stars from here!
*Giggle* [chara:100702:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100702:cheek_0][chara:100702:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100702:lipSynch_1]What do you think?
It is! Keep complimenting me!

group_1.textLeft: What exactly are you going to use the@telescope for?

group_1.textRight: I've already decided!
I'm going to explore the galaxy using the@21-centimeter hydrogen line!
It means, I'll observe the universe.
I'll make a scientific analysis from my@point of view!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, those are some huge goals...
Do you think you might even find some@aliens?

group_1.textRight: Aliens?

group_1.textLeft: If they exist, I wonder what they look like.
I've read in the past they could be humanoid,@animalistic orâ€”

group_1.textRight: Hey! Stop making this sound like some kind@of fun experiment!

group_1.textLeft: I was only stating what I had read in past@reference materials.

group_1.textRight: And I'm saying I'm going to logically observe@the state of the universe, not play around!

group_1.textCenter: The same events are unfolding here as they@did in the other universes...
Things must've changed once she started on@the path to becoming a Magical Girl...
I need to look at everything...

group_1.narration: I watched everything about Iroha,@almost frame-by-frame...
